entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
